alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, north central Pinellas and north central Hillsborough Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Land O Lakes, or near Lutz, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Port Richey, Lutz, Holiday, Hudson, Palm Harbor, Jasmine Estates, New Port Richey East, Land O Lakes, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Lake Magdalene, Citrus Park, Oldsmar, Trinity, Elfers, Moon Lake, Odessa, Jay B Starkey Wilderness Park and Bayonet Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
